entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear late in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 04 March 2023
